title: ennaLavil
sahitya:
ennaLavil shiridum karuNai illAda dEnammA Ezhai


anupallavi

  malarinai orukaNam maravA unadaDimai nAn anrO ammA


caraNam    uLLum puramum nirai un tiruvaruLai maandu tirundaden manakkurangu
uLLam muzhudum nirai kaLLam kapaTam tanak-kellaiyillai aDimai enakkirangu
eLLaLavum nanneri shelAvilangu nErenaik-kAvAdadum dharmamO
teLLumarai pugazh tirupperundurai dEvi yOgAmbikE pEdai
